verbs.description: [V: rockets] lakers debacle happened in front of worst possible person on the planet in some strange and weird nba news the man in charge of the lakers rockets suspensions was watching live at staples center houston kiki vandeweghe brandon ingram national basketball association rajon rondo houston rockets staples center nba james harden los angeles lakers rockets band chris paul lakers rockets adrian wojnarowski executive vp of basketball operations
